item.description:
Location TBD...

As a result of our meet up event today, March 20, we are planning an event on May 1st to celebrate spring.

Our concept is to Trend Colors with a focus on bold, bright colors and patterns of the season.

We need:

1 model female (age 15-17)

2 models - female (adult)

1 model - male (adult)

clothes-Luana will assist me in working on contacting boutiques for clothes and accessories

Location -I am working on location/scene options if anyone knows of a place we may be able to use to create some nice images let me know.

  • school/library (teen)
  • coffee shop or bistro
  • art center/movie theater (teen)
  • park (teen)
  • night club
  • office building
  • store/boutique for shopping scene

 

Team:

(note: photo teams will be assigned for this event so you will know what, who and where you will be shooting).

Fashion stylist/makeup artist/photographer - Lorrie

Assistant stylist/fashion designer - Luana

Makeup assistant -TBD

Hair stylist -TBD

Nail stylist - TBD

Photographer #2 -TBD

Photographer #3 -TBD

Photographer assistant #1 - Jeff

Photographer assistant #-2 Kiki

Photographer assistant #3 -TBD

If anyone can help to fill our needs or open positions, please let me know.

This is an event. This is non paid.

Additional details and updates to follow.

- Lorrie
item.why: It's a great way to collaborate our talents and create great images. Date change moved to May 22ndt. Please update your RSVP

group.name: Boston Beauty, Fashion and Photo Stylist

item.name: Spring Trend Color Event - date change
